PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-12492018-10-04,  GAC,  ,  , 
ActChemical Weapons Convention Implementation Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Schedule 1 Chemicals Regulations (Chemical Weapons Convention)
PrecisRegulations Amending the SCHEDULE 1 CHEMICALS REGULATIONS (CHEMICAL WEAPONS CONVENTION) in order to make the modifications recommended by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations and some additional non-substantive, standardizing/corrective changes identified during the drafting process. These amendments improve clarity in the regulations and correct differences between French and English versions.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0202 Publication Date: 2018-10-31
AttachmentsAttachment
